profit sharing.translation[0].definition: a system by which all the people who work for a company receive part of its profits
profit sharing.translation[1].definition: when a company gives part of its profits to its employees
He has long believed in employee profit-sharing or employee ownership.
The 2007 profit-sharing payments averaged $650 among full-time employees.
when a MUTUAL (=an insurance company or other financial institution without shareholders) pays out part of its profits to its members
